capabilities.capability_name: Long-distance dependencies between predicate and ARG0

tests.test_name: Effect of injecting relative clause between predicate and ARG0
tests.test_description: Test description.

tests.test_name: Sentences without relative clause between predicate and ARG0
tests.test_description: Tests the SRL system's ability to identify the ARG0 in simple sentences without relative clauses.

tests.test_name: Sentences with relative clause between predicate and ARG0
tests.test_description: Tests the SRL system's ability to identify the ARG0 in long sentences with relative clauses between predicate and ARG0.

capabilities.capability_name: Long-distance dependencies between predicate and ARG1

tests.test_name: Effect of injecting adverbial or participial phrase between predicate and ARG1
tests.test_description: Test description.

tests.test_name: Sentence without adverbial or participial phrase between predicate and ARG1
tests.test_description: This tests the system's baseline ability to predict the ARG1 role, without added syntactic distance.

tests.test_name: Sentence with adverbial or participial phrase between predicate and ARG1
tests.test_description: This tests the system's ability to predict the ARG1 role, with added syntactic distance.

capabilities.capability_name: Robustness to noise in the form of typos
capabilities.capability_description: Evaluates the impact of lexical noise, in both proper nouns and common nouns, in the form of typos on ARG0 labeling.

tests.test_name: Effect of typos in proper nouns as ARG0 on ARG0 labeling
tests.test_description: Tests the system's robustness to typos in proper nouns affecting ARG0 labeling.

tests.test_name: Effect of typos in common nouns as ARG0 on ARG0 labeling
tests.test_description: Tests the system's robustness to typos in common nouns affecting ARG0 labeling.

tests.test_name: Sentences without typos in ARG0 for proper noun ARG0 labeling
tests.test_description: Tests the system's baseline ability to identify ARG0 proper nouns without typos.

tests.test_name: Sentences with typos in ARG0 for proper noun ARG0 labeling
tests.test_description: Tests the system's robustness to typos in proper nouns affecting ARG0 labeling.

tests.test_name: Sentences without typos in ARG0 for common noun ARG0 labeling
tests.test_description: Tests the system's baseline ability to identify ARG0 common nouns without typos.

tests.test_name: Sentences with typos in ARG0 for common noun ARG0 labeling
tests.test_description: Tests the system's ability to identify ARG0 proper nouns with typos.

capabilities.capability_name: Effect of semantic atypicality in active voice syntactically simple SVO sentences on ARG0 labeling
capabilities.capability_description: Tests the system's ability to handle sentences with atypical semantic roles as ARG0, such as inanimate objects and abstract concepts. Only active voice syntactically simple SVO sentences are considered.

tests.test_name: Animate objects as ARG0
tests.test_description: Tests the system's ability to correctly identify animate objects as ARG0, used as a baseline to compare inanimate objects as ARG0 against.

tests.test_name: Inanimate objects as ARG0
tests.test_description: Tests the system's ability to correctly identify inanimate objects as ARG0.

tests.test_name: Animate versus inanimate concepts as ARG0
tests.test_description: Tests the system's ability to correctly identify animate versus inanimate concepts as ARG0.

tests.test_name: Non-abstract concepts as ARG0
tests.test_description: Tests the system's ability to correctly identify non-abstract concepts as Arg-0, used as a baseline to compare against abstract concepts as Arg-0.

tests.test_name: Abstract concepts as ARG0
tests.test_description: Tests the system's ability to correctly identify abstract concepts as Arg-0.

tests.test_name: Abstract vs non-abstract concepts as ARG0
tests.test_description: Tests the system's sensitivity to using abstract vs non-abstract concepts as ARG0.

capabilities.capability_description: Tests the system's ability to correctly identify dative verb alternations.

tests.test_name: Dative verb alternations effect on ARG1
tests.test_description: Tests whether the system can correctly identify the ARG1 in dative verb alternations.

tests.test_name: Dative verb alternations with prepositional dative construction for ARG1
tests.test_description: Tests whether the system can correctly identify the ARG1 in dative verb alternations with prepositional dative construction

tests.test_name: Dative verb alternations with double object construction for ARG1
tests.test_description: Tests whether the system can correctly identify the ARG1 in dative verb alternations with double object construction
